attributes.action: Ensure that all MP's are required to put the needs and want's of thier constituants before the requirement of the party they represent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's have become more and more seperated from the people that they represent and politicians are now seem as remote. By requiring then to put the thoughts and hopes of thier constituants before party politics MP's would have to reconnect with the people that they are supposed to represent. The abolishion of the whip system and the introduction of free voting would also introduce more respect for MP's.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
